para.text: Return the distance between two points
This function returns the distance between two points
according to the Euclidean distance formula.

param.name: x0
param.text: The x-coordinate of the first point

param.name: y0
param.text: The y-coordinate of the first point

param.name: x1
param.text: The x-coordinate of the second point

param.name: y1
param.text: The y-coordinate of the second point

returns.text: The distance between the two points
